text: And the side-chambers were broader as they encompassed <FI>the house<Fi> higher and higher; for the encompassing of the house went higher and higher round about the house: therefore the breadth of the house <FI>continued<Fi> upward; and so one went up <FI>from<Fi> the lowest <FI>chamber<Fi> to the highest by the middle <FI>chamber<Fi> .
name: Ezekiel 41:7
